items.label: rclpy: Bridging Python Agents to ROS 2
Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation + Synthetic Data

intro/intro.title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro/intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive educational book on Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics. This book covers the complete end-to-end robotics pipeline from middleware to perception to action, with a focus on modern approaches using ROS 2, simulation environments, AI perception systems, and Vision-Language-Action (VLA) systems.

modules/module-1-ros2/index.title: Module 1: ROS 2 Fundamentals
modules/module-1-ros2/index.description: Welcome to Module 1 of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics book. This module covers the foundational concepts of ROS 2, which serves as the robotic nervous system for humanoid robots.

modules/module-1-ros2/rclpy-python-agent.title: rclpy: Bridging Python Agents to ROS 2

modules/module-2-digital-twin/index.title: Module 2: Digital Twin (Gazebo & Unity)
modules/module-2-digital-twin/index.description: Welcome to Module 2 of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics book. This module explores digital twin concepts using simulation environments, focusing on physics simulation, sensor modeling, and high-fidelity rendering.

modules/module-3-ai-brain/index.title: Module 3: AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)
modules/module-3-ai-brain/index.description: Welcome to Module 3 of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics book. This module focuses on AI-powered perception and navigation systems using NVIDIA Isaac technologies.

modules/module-3-ai-brain/isaac-sim.title: Isaac Sim: Photorealistic Simulation + Synthetic Data

modules/module-4-vla/index.title: Module 4: Vision-Language-Action (VLA)
modules/module-4-vla/index.description: Welcome to Module 4 of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics book. This module focuses on Vision-Language-Action systems that enable humanoid robots to understand and respond to human commands through voice and visual input.

speed-insights/frameworks.title: Framework-Specific Implementation
speed-insights/frameworks.description: This guide provides detailed instructions for integrating Vercel Speed Insights with various frameworks.

speed-insights/getting-started.title: Getting Started with Speed Insights
speed-insights/getting-started.description: This guide will help you get started with using Vercel Speed Insights on your project, showing you how to enable it, add the package to your project, deploy your app to Vercel, and view your data in the dashboard.

speed-insights/limits-and-pricing.title: Limits and Pricing
speed-insights/limits-and-pricing.description: Speed Insights is Vercel's real user monitoring (RUM) solution for understanding application performance. Here's what you need to know about limits, pricing, and how to optimize your usage.

speed-insights/metrics.title: Understanding Speed Insights Metrics
speed-insights/metrics.description: Speed Insights tracks a comprehensive set of performance metrics that help you understand how your application performs for real users.

speed-insights/optimization.title: Performance Optimization Guide
speed-insights/optimization.description: This guide provides actionable strategies to improve your metrics based on Speed Insights data.

speed-insights/package.title: Using the @vercel/speed-insights Package
speed-insights/package.description: The @vercel/speed-insights package provides various options and configuration methods to customize Speed Insights for your specific needs.

speed-insights/privacy-policy.title: Privacy and Compliance Standards
speed-insights/privacy-policy.description: Vercel Speed Insights is designed with privacy and compliance as core principles. This guide explains how Speed Insights respects user privacy and complies with major data protection regulations.

speed-insights/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Speed Insights
speed-insights/troubleshooting.description: This guide helps you resolve common issues with Vercel Speed Insights.
